value.string: Task Name: 1.3.0 Download reports from Backstop
Task Description: log into backstop app and download reports from 1-MGR STMT CHECK and 2-TR DETAIL pages.

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import requests
import json
import pandas as pd
import logging
import re
import numpy as np

def BackstopJsonToExcelMgrChk (Largs):
    jObj = json.loads(Largs[0])
    rows = jObj["data"]["attributes"]["result"]["values"]
    df = pd.DataFrame(rows)
    print(df.dtypes)    
    df.drop('Most Recent Valuation', axis=1)
    df = df.astype({
        'MostRecentValuationPeriod':'datetime64[ns]',
        'DateReceived':'datetime64[ns]'
    })
    df['Beginning Balance'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Beginning Balance'],errors='coerce')
    df['Contributions'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Contributions'],errors='coerce')
    df['Distributions'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Distributions'],errors='coerce')
    df['Income'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Income'],errors='coerce')
    df['Expenses'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Expenses'],errors='coerce')
    df['Management Fees'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Management Fees'],errors='coerce')
    df['Placement Agent Fees'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Placement Agent Fees'],errors='coerce')
    df['Net Income (Loss)'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Net Income (Loss)'],errors='coerce')
    df['Realized Gain (Loss)'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Realized Gain (Loss)'],errors='coerce')
    df['Unrealized Gain (Loss)'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Unrealized Gain (Loss)'],errors='coerce')
    df['Carried Interest Allocation'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Carried Interest Allocation'],errors='coerce')
    df['Accrual Adjustment'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Accrual Adjustment'],errors='coerce')
    df['Prior Accrual Adjustment'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Prior Accrual Adjustment'],errors='coerce')
    df['Mgr Stmt MV (calculated)'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Mgr Stmt MV (calculated)'],errors='coerce')
    df['Most Recent Valuation (numerical)'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Most Recent Valuation (numerical)'],errors='coerce')
    df['MV Diff'] = pd.to_numeric(df['MV Diff'],errors='coerce')    
    df = df.replace(np.nan,0,regex=True)
    df = df.rename(columns={'Most Recent Valuation (numerical)':'Most Recent Valuation'})
    df.to_excel(Largs[1], index=False)

def BackstopJsonToExcelDetail (Largs):
    jObj = json.loads(Largs[0])
    rows = jObj["data"]["attributes"]["result"]["values"]
    df = pd.DataFrame(rows)  
    df['Effective Date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['Effective Date']).dt.date
    df['Mgmt Fee Period Begin Date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['Mgmt Fee Period Begin Date']).dt.date
    df['Mgmt Fee Period End Date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['Mgmt Fee Period End Date']).dt.date
    df['Current Date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['Current Date']).dt.date
    df['Initial Value (redemptions negative, number)'] = df['Initial Value (redemptions negative, number)'].astype('float64')    
    df = df.drop(columns='Initial Value (Redemptions Negative)')
    df = df.rename(columns={'Initial Value (redemptions negative, number)':'Initial Value (Redemptions Negative)'})
    df.to_excel(Largs[1], index=False)
    
    #ExcelFormatting As Needed
    writer = pd.ExcelWriter(Largs[1],
                        engine='xlsxwriter',
                        date_format='m/d/yyyy')
    df.to_excel(writer,sheet_name='Sheet1',index=False)
    workbook  = writer.book    
    worksheet = writer.sheets['Sheet1']
    for idx, col in enumerate(df):  # loop through all columns
        series = df[col]
        max_len = max((
            series.astype(str).map(len).max(),  # len of largest item
            len(str(series.name))  # len of column name/header
            )) + 1  # adding a little extra space
        worksheet.set_column(idx, idx, max_len)  # set column width
    # Close the Pandas Excel writer and output the Excel file.
    writer.save()

If Python has zero records, returns empty string. 
If there is an Error, it returns Bot Error
